com.edwardium.RPGEngine.IO

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edwardium.RPGEngine.IO.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles input from existing window.

      Data class representing mouse drag event.

      void lockKey(int code)
      Locking a key makes functions that return pressed/released status to return false until the key status really becomes GLFW_RELEASE, at which point the lock releases and these functions will return the true state until locked again.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Input

        public Input(long window)
        Parameters:
        window - Window handle to collect events from.

    • Method Detail

      • watchKey

        public void watchKey(int key)
        Starts storing last press and last release for given key. Watching a key is useful if you need to check the last time the key was pressed, to detect double taps or long presses.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to watch.

      • unwatchKey

        public void unwatchKey(int key)
        Stops storing last press and last release for given key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to unwatch.

      • getKeyPressed

        public boolean getKeyPressed(int code)
        Parameters:
        code - Key code. Doesn't have to be a watched key.
        Returns:
        Whether the key is pressed right now.

      • lockKey

        public void lockKey(int code)
        Locking a key makes functions that return pressed/released status to return false until the key status really becomes GLFW_RELEASE, at which point the lock releases and these functions will return the true state until locked again.
        Parameters:
        code - Key code to lock.

      • getWatchedKeyJustPressed

        public boolean getWatchedKeyJustPressed(int code,
                                        double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        code - Key code.
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether the key was pressed sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now]. If the key is not watched, returns false.

      • getWatchedKeyJustReleased

        public boolean getWatchedKeyJustReleased(int code,
                                         double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        code - Key code.
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether the key was released sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now]. If the key is not watched, returns false.

      • getScrollUpJustNow

        public boolean getScrollUpJustNow(double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether there was an scroll up event sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now].

      • getScrollDownJustNow

        public boolean getScrollDownJustNow(double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether there was an scroll down event sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now].

      • getMousePressed

        public boolean getMousePressed(int code)
        Parameters:
        code - Mouse button code.
        Returns:
        Whether code mouse button is pressed right now.

      • getMouseJustPressed

        public boolean getMouseJustPressed(int code,
                                   double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        code - Mouse button code.
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether the mouse button 1 was pressed sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now].

      • getMouseJustReleased

        public boolean getMouseJustReleased(int code,
                                    double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        code - Mouse button code.
        timeThreshold - Time threshold.
        Returns:
        Whether the mouse button 1 was released sometime in the interval [now - timeThreshold; now].

      • getMouseTimeSincePress

        public double getMouseTimeSincePress(int code)
        Parameters:
        code - Mouse button code.
        Returns:
        Nanoseconds since the last time this button has been pressed.

      • getMouseDrag

        public Input.MouseDrag getMouseDrag(int code,
                                    double timeThreshold)
        Parameters:
        code - Mouse button code. Currently supported only for button 1 and 2.
        timeThreshold - Time threshold for drag end.
        Returns:
        Mouse drag event that is still ongoing or ended no less than timeThreshold nanoseconds ago.

      • setGameCursorCenter

        public void setGameCursorCenter(Vector2D center)
        Sets the center point for calculating cursor position in getGameCursorPos.
        Parameters:
        center - Center point,
        See Also:
        getGameCursorPos()

      • getGameCursorPos

        public Vector2D getGameCursorPos()
        Returns:
        Cursor position relative to gameCursorCenter

      • getGameCursorPos

        public Vector2D getGameCursorPos(Vector2D pos)
        Parameters:
        pos - Position to calculate cursor coordinates from.
        Returns:
        Coordinates of pos relative to gameCursorCenter.
